title: [bug] Can't upgrade a Tauri v2 v2 app on Windows due to same ProductCode

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

It seems like this change ( https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/pull/10969/files ) broke our updates on Windows, even though the Upgrade Code remains the same (see table below)

I can go from 1.7.7 to 1.7.8, but it's not possible to go 1.7.8 to 1.7.9 due to the error below.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9c371efa-5170-4001-bd9f-c8ad07431ee1)

|Version|ProductName|ProductCode                                   |UpgradeCode                           |PackageCode                           |Tauri                                 |
|-------|-----------|----------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|
|1.7.6  |Aptakube   |{03B0F069-1FA2-4A9B-BEF7-D05D11340D89}        |{9A01B1BB-D16F-5024-B6C4-49466D7730D8}|{AC7A72F1-864A-4555-BC9A-5EEA6900A135}|v1                                    |
|1.7.7  |Aptakube   |{5404D691-23AF-4004-B438-F78DEBC517AB}        |{9A01B1BB-D16F-5024-B6C4-49466D7730D8}|{68863FB5-9D23-4D22-A628-D7D160C66B2C}|v1                                    |
|1.7.8  |Aptakube   |{21050BE2-9EF1-5E08-A36F-45260B21F2C2}        |{9A01B1BB-D16F-5024-B6C4-49466D7730D8}|{DC54E05C-F647-49DF-B0DE-83597C298205}|v2                                    |
|1.7.9  |Aptakube   |{21050BE2-9EF1-5E08-A36F-45260B21F2C2}        |{9A01B1BB-D16F-5024-B6C4-49466D7730D8}|{7A066D33-48C8-4BD2-BB6A-56CFD3F07F5A}|v2                                    |



### Reproduction

The code is not open source, but the releases are available here ( https://github.com/aptakube/aptakube/tags ), if you install 1.7.8, you won't be able to upgrade to 1.7.9

### Expected behavior

_No response_
